data.name: Zombie Army 4: Van Helsing Weapon Skins
data.detailed_description:
When there’s too much at stake, bring the pain with these Van Helsing Weapon Skins!

Styled after the legendary vampire hunter’s arsenal, it’s time for your guns to look the part! Apply a stylish Van Helsing finish to your guns with these weapon skins*.
*Skins apply to the following weapons, and are not compatible with DLC weapons:
• Gewehr 43 (Van Helsing)
• M1 Garand (Van Helsing)
• Mosin-Nagant M91/30 (Van Helsing)
• M30 Drilling (Van Helsing)
• MP44 (Van Helsing)
• Thompson (Van Helsing)
• Trench Gun (Van Helsing)
• C96 Pistol (Van Helsing)
• M1911 (Van Helsing)
• Webley MKVI (Van Helsing)

data.short_description: When there’s too much at stake, bring the pain with these Van Helsing Weapon Skins!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
